pages.text: $(bgreen)Sun Shroom$() hates sun so much that when sun builds up in its system, it spits sun out as fast as possible. To it, sun is crass.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)25$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Huge Fast$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)producer$() plant that generate $(byellow)sun$() every 30 seconds. It need $(l)a whole day$() to grow up and produce $()more sun$() each time. $(bred)It will sleep at daytime$().
$(bgreen)Plant Food :$() It will instantly produce large amount of sun.
